revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokémon Tower |image = [[File:Pokemon Tower.png]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokemon Tower. |tokens = 750 |location = West of Lavender Town }} The '''Pokemon Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in an 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 7,523 |- | Marowak (Boss) || 37,615 |}
==Pokémon==
* Gastly * Haunter * Cubone * Marowak (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 40% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 40% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 20% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
